doc:
Sabrina Scharf https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sabrina_Scharf 0 Sabrina Scharf (born Sandra Mae Trentman, October 17, 1943) is an American actress best known for her roles on American television shows. She was a Playboy Bunny (1962-1963) in New York. She appeared in the movie Easy Rider and once guest-starred on Star Trek.After Scharf quit acting in the 1970s, she became an anti-pollution activist and unsuccessfully ran for the California State Senate. She was married to television writer Bob Schiller.Sabrina Scharf Schiller became an attorney in 1989. Sabrina_Scharf ( born Sandra_Mae_Trentman , October_17_,_1943 ) is an_American_actress best_known for her_roles on American_television_shows . She was a_Playboy_Bunny_(_1962-1963_) in New_York . She appeared in the_movie_Easy_Rider and once guest-starred on Star_Trek.After_Scharf quit_acting in the_1970s , she became an_anti-pollution_activist and unsuccessfully_ran for the_California_State_Senate . She was_married to television_writer_Bob_Schiller.Sabrina_Scharf_Schiller became an_attorney in 1989 .
